doc.title: Don't Pick Up the Phone (Whatever You Do 'Cause It May Be the Devil)
doc.plot: Jeremy, an up and coming Christian rock star, is on the verge of national stardom. Joined by his business manager/mother and his air head 'fiancee,' he meets with a renown Turkish star-maker (Ahmet) to discuss the band's upcoming single release. As the meeting progresses, however, the threesome's bizarre behavior is cause for suspicion. And when a mysterious phone call keys Ahmet in on what everyone's aware of but no one wants to admit, the two men must find a way to prevent Jeremy's hidden desires from sabotaging their mutual success.
